description:
Honerva is attempting to turn some otherwise peaceful Sand Creatures into horrible Mechablack Beastmen! At the request of Raible’s friend Dr. Harvard, the GoLion team goes to thwart the plan as Fala befriends one of the Sand Creatures but is horrified when Sincline has it turned into a Beastman! Will the GoLion team survive Sincline’s dark magic sand tsunami?
Source: crunchyroll
